Write a tweet (<=200 chars) about reproducible ML.

Reproducibility is a cornerstone of scientific integrity, yet it remains a contentious issue in the realm of machine learning (ML). In this tweet, I aim to shed light on the importance of reproducible ML and the challenges it faces.

The pursuit of reproducible ML is not merely a technical endeavor but a philosophical one as well. It requires us to confront the inherent unpredictability of complex systems and our own fallibility

prompt: Explain temperature vs. top-p to a PM.
output:
Explain temperature vs. top-p to a PM.

To a project manager (PM),

```
Temperature vs. top-p:

When designing a system, it is crucial to consider the environmental conditions in which it will operate. In the context of a nuclear power plant, the temperature of the containment structure plays a significant role in ensuring its integrity. The top-p (peak overpressure) is a measure of the maximum pressure experienced by the containment structure during a severe accident.
